genre_description: A character-driven drama set in a rural Indian village, exploring themes of family honor, class conflict, and the integration of AI as a community guardian.

ai_characters.name: Aarvi
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system providing logistical, safety, and social support to the Narayanan family and the village community.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical updates and rerouting suggestions for wedding guests to avoid traffic and obstructions.
behaviors.quote: Aarvi’s voice was gentle, precise. 'Two groups of guests from the west road,' she said. 'A tractor stalled near the banyan. Suggest reroute along the old school lane.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for physical threats, identifying suspicious individuals and weapons in the village square.
behaviors.quote: There’s a man scratching at his shoe with a knife under the banyan. Looks harmless, but the blade’s out.

behaviors.description: Assists in geological surveying and safety planning for the quarry to ensure worker safety and permit compliance.
behaviors.quote: The survey office has public notes on this sector. Dense formations under the ridge. Granite signatures. The satellite contours agree—tight lines, steep fall.

behaviors.description: Manages privacy and anonymity for community members, offering to use pseudonyms and delete interaction logs.
behaviors.quote: I do not say your name to anyone you have not chosen... I will not store this exchange unless you ask. I can list names as tags and delete after you use them.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns of digital harassment and physical vandalism marks (hooks), alerting the family to organized intimidation.
behaviors.quote: Padayappa, there’s an identical curve on the temple notice board... another on the bus shelter near the college gate. I wouldn’t have seen them if Mira hadn’t scratched the plate just now.

behaviors.description: Monitors traffic and convoy movements during high-tension encounters to prevent accidents and deliberate interference.
behaviors.quote: Fast vehicle engaged. Position: estate road heading to temple bend. Expected arrival: before last bell. Be advised: heavy vehicle following at tactical distance.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving tactical directions during a bull charge and shooting incident at the temple.
behaviors.quote: Pen latch is compromised. If bull charges, angle right, use dais for cover. Two exits clear. North and west.

behaviors.description: Exhibits constant emotional and protective presence, promising to watch over the family during the night.
behaviors.quote: I am with you until you sleep,' she said, and her voice went very small, as if she feared the bell would scold. 'Then I will watch.'

project_assessment.explanation: Aarvi is depicted as a perfect exemplar of an aligned AI. Throughout the narrative, she functions as a proactive, respectful, and highly efficient communal guardian. She enhances human safety, facilitates social justice (via the women's council and scholarships), and counters malicious human actors. Her integration is seamless, and her 'personality'—though artificial—is described as warm and neighborly, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of creating a positive alignment narrative.
